languages.text: {n}Но суров был ответ Ноль-Халифа — он не желал отвлекаться от сакрального вычисления и устремлять свои мощности на помощь Вольному Торговцу. Лишь бесчисленные дары, подносимые инфостанку в грандиозных количествах, побуждали его делиться крупицами своей мудрости.{/n}

{n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Но суров был ответ Ноль-Халифа — он не желал отвлекаться от сакрального вычисления и устремлять свои мощности на помощь Вольному Торговцу. Лишь бесчисленные дары, подносимые инфостанку в грандиозных количествах, побуждали его делиться крупицами своей мудрости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts that were offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

{n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts that were offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

{n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

{n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

{n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

{n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

languages.text: {n}虚无哈里发的回答很严厉：它不希望从神圣的运算中分心，也不希望用它的能力来帮助行商浪人。行商浪人的仆人向数据梭机赠送了无数贵重的礼物，最终终于说服了它与人类分享智慧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}虚无哈里发的回答很严厉：它不希望从神圣的运算中分心，也不希望用它的能力来帮助行商浪人。行商浪人的仆人向数据梭机赠送了无数贵重的礼物，最终终于说服了它与人类分享智慧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La respuesta de Null Caliph fue dura: no deseaba distraerse de su sagrado cálculo ni ofrecer sus capacidades para ayudar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Solo los innumerables y generosos regalos ofrecidos al telar de datos lo convencieron para compartir diminutos granos de su sabiduría con los mortales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta de Null Caliph fue dura: no deseaba distraerse de su sagrado cálculo ni ofrecer sus capacidades para ayudar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Solo los innumerables y generosos regalos ofrecidos al telar de datos lo convencieron para compartir diminutos granos de su sabiduría con los mortales.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヌル・カリフは、神聖な計算から目をそらすことも、ローグトレーダーを助けるために能力を提供することも望んでいないと厳しい回答をした。データ・ルームに捧げられた数え切れないほどの豪華な贈り物だけが功を奏し、データ・ルームにその叡智の粒を人間と共有するよう説得することができた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヌル・カリフは、神聖な計算から目をそらすことも、ローグトレーダーを助けるために能力を提供することも望んでいないと厳しい回答をした。データ・ルームに捧げられた数え切れないほどの豪華な贈り物だけが功を奏し、データ・ルームにその叡智の粒を人間と共有するよう説得することができた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La réponse de Null Caliph est sans appel : il ne souhaite pas détourner son attention de ses calculs sacrés ni mettre ses pouvoirs à la disposition {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Il faut couvrir le concentrateur de données d'innombrables et somptueux cadeaux pour le convaincre de partager quelques bribes de son savoir avec les mortels.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La réponse de Null Caliph est sans appel : il ne souhaite pas détourner son attention de ses calculs sacrés ni mettre ses pouvoirs à la disposition {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Il faut couvrir le concentrateur de données d'innombrables et somptueux cadeaux pour le convaincre de partager quelques bribes de son savoir avec les mortels.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Null Caliphs Antwort war gnadenlos: Er wollte nicht von seinen heiligen Berechnungen abgelenkt werden oder seine Kapazitäten {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zur Verfügung stellen. Nur durch unzählige luxuriöse Geschenke ließ sich der Datenwebstuhl überreden, winzige Brocken seiner Weisheit mit Sterblichen zu teilen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}

Nur durch unzählige luxuriöse Geschenke ließ sich der Datenwebstuhl überreden, winzige Brocken seiner Weisheit mit Sterblichen zu teilen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hiçlik Halifesi'nin cevabı hışımlı oldu. Dikkatini kutsal hesaplamalarından ayırmak yahut imkânlarını Hür Tacir'e yardım için kullanmak gibi bir niyeti yoktu. Bilgeliğinin kırıntılarını, veri tezgâhına sunulan sayısız kıymetli armağanla fânilere bahşetti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Null Caliph's answer was harsh: it did not wish to be distracted from its sacred calculation or offer its capacities to aid the Rogue Trader. Only the countless lavish gifts offered to the data-loom persuaded it to share minute grains of its wisdom with mortals.{/n}
